Reviews.Title: perfect adapter
Reviews.Author: nxx2
Reviews.Content: This converter has worked wonderfully in USA for UK manufactured shaver. Quite happy with it. Great for travel to USA for UK residents.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: Christine Shellenberger
Reviews.Content: I purchased a security system from overseas and they have the European plugs. They only sent one of these with my order of the system, so I needed to find these at an inexpensive price. The price of these are great.I would recommend these if you are traveling to a foreign country.

Reviews.Title: Love it. Very useful. Thanks!
Reviews.Author: prionbrain
Reviews.Content: Love it. It's compact, useful, sturdy enough and definitely works:). My machine works perfectly at the moment, and I have no problems. Thanks.

Reviews.Title: The y do what they are supposed to do and at a very reasonable price IMO.
Reviews.Author: styleon
Reviews.Content: I ordered 2 of these items.  Yes as the other review states they are black.  However, I found them to work very well and to be an inexpensive solution to converting 2 induction charging pads with European plugs to US outlets. They provided me with a good, solid fit and connection to the outlets.  I am pleased with their function.

Reviews.Title: Works as described but different color
Reviews.Author: Ed S
Reviews.Content: Both the American plug and the European socket provide a good electrical connection.  The one I received was black, not white.

Reviews.Title: Good but not perfect
Reviews.Author: moayyad
Reviews.Content: it's a good product, i have one for my laptop and one for my hairdryer, I tried using one for both but everytime I switch it feels like it's gonna fall apart.

Reviews.Title: was black instead of white
Reviews.Author: Browneyedgirl
Reviews.Content: had already purchased a 3pk and needed 1 more, the 3pk were white, which is what I wanted, but the this third one is blackthe cordes and controller for the lights I needed it for are all white. if it isn't white then they shouldn't show it as white instead of blackbad for businessI contacted them w/no response frm them whatsoever

ProductInfo.Features:
Convert your Europe based power plug tip to US Power plug tip
This unit simply convert the plug tip but does not convert any power
ProductInfo.Name: Tmvel Universal International Power Adapter Plug Tip Converter - Convert Europe To USA - Great for Cell Phone Charger
